page.title: 20 WEST ALLOTMENT.
page.content: A small community situated east of the main A1 Trunk road at the A191 turn off Most inhabitants live in small,back to back terraced houses.Many of the former inhabitants were miners and many retired miners remain in the existing cottages built in 1904. A block of 38 sheltered homes is near completion with provision for a common room and a duty warden.20 new semi-detached houses have recently been occupied.Amenities include a Video Shop and Off Licence,a Post Office,two general dealers shops and a hairdresser Nearby entertainments include the Northumberland Arms,a Working Mens Club and a Community Centre. Many locals rent some of the 103 allotment plots hence the name West Allotment.
